name: Laundry In!
description:
Are you tired of doing your laundry?  Become a wizard and take your laundry in just like that!  Laundry In is a single-player hyper-casual game where you play as a supreme wizard doing his laundry.  He has obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD) and likes to organise his laundry, so be careful!

CONTROLS

Left Click on the correct Laundry Bucket to take the laundry in!

AUDIO CREDIT

Game Theme: https://peritune.com/blog/2019/12/01/toys_march2/
Menu Buttons: https://freesound.org/people/Christopherderp/sounds/342200/
Magic Poof: https://freesound.org/people/Saviraz/sounds/512217/

FEEDBACK WELCOME

As we are still in the initial stages of developing Laundry In!, we're going to need all the feedback we can get!  Please let us know if you find any bugs / things that annoy you when testing our little game!

FOLLOW US

Follow us on Instagram @twopigs.studio for regular posts about our game dev progress and making art for games!
